data.title: Obituaries
data.meta_description: Celebrate the lives of community members on our obituaries page. Find life stories and service details for Crookston, MN and nearby areas.
data.meta_site_name: KROX | The Voice Of The Valley - Your Award Winning Source For Sports, News & Weather in the Crookston Area
data.text:
Amy Jeanette Follette, 24, of Crookston, MN, passed away in Altru Hospital, Grand Forks, on Wednesday evening, August 21, 2024, with her family at her side. Together, they had all been battling Amy’s heath issues for the past several years. Amy was born in Crookston on June 21st, 2000, the precious …

Read More

Maurice Gene Cote passed away on Wednesday, August 21st, at 8pm, surrounded by family at Benedictine Living Community in Crookston, MN. Maurice was born on September 23rd, 1936, to Aristide and Agnes Cote at home in rural Terrebonne Township in Red Lake County, Minnesota. He grew up on a farm just o…

Read More

Lowell V. Gunderson, 93, Ada, MN, passed away on Tuesday, August 20, 2024 at Essentia Health in Ada. Lowell Gunderson, the son of Ole and Clara (Slette) Gunderson, was born on January 31, 1931. He grew up on the family farm in rural Gary, Minnesota. He attended the local country School (District 91)…

Read More

Matthew James Warmsbecker, 62, of McIntosh, MN, died Monday, August 19, 2024, in Fair Meadow Nursing Home, Fertile MN. Mr. Warmsbecker was born on May 29, 1962, in Williston, ND to parents James and Delores (Andersen) Warmsbecker. He grew up in Powers Lake, ND, and Thief River Falls and Crookston, M…

Read More

Joel Vaughn Amiot, 56, of Crookston, Minnesota, passed away unexpectedly at home on Sunday, July 28, 2024. Joel, a New Year’s Baby, was born in Crookston on January 1, 1968, to Jerome “Jerry” and Priscilla (Veenstra) Amiot. He grew up in Crookston, surrounded by his three siblings and ma…

Read More

Harold V. Olson, 98, Rural Fertile, Minnesota, passed away on Monday, August 12, 2024, at the Hillsboro Medical Center in Hillsboro, North Dakota. Harold Vernon Olson was born on October 19, 1925, in Rindal, Minnesota to Arthur Olson and Clara (Rude) Olson. He attended country school through the ei…
